Quote: Whenever you're successful you owe that success to the people in the community, because they are the ones buying your product.

Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.

Author: Henry James Sumner Maine
Quote: It is true that the aristocracies seem to have abused their monopoly of legal knowledge; and at all events their exclusive possession of the law was a formidable impediment to the success of those popular movements which began to be universal in the western world.

Author: Tony Dungy
Quote: The secret to success is good leadership, and good leadership is all about making the lives of your team members or workers better.

Author: David Cameron
Quote: I have no time for those who say there is no way Scotland could go it alone. I know first-hand the contribution Scotland and Scots make to Britain's success - so for me there's no question about whether Scotland could be an independent nation.

Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote: When success comes, people can try to trick you or take advantage of you.

Author: Julius Erving
Quote: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: To dream by night is to escape your life. To dream by day is to make it happen.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Let today be the day you stop being haunted by the ghost of yesterday. Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.

Author: Horace
Quote: The envious man grows lean at the success of his neighbor.

Author: Dr. Seuss,  Oh, The Places You'll Go!
Quote: Congratulations!Today is your day.You're off to Great Places!You're off and away!

Author: Victor Kiam
Quote: Entrepreneurs are risk takers, willing to roll the dice with their money or reputation on the line in support of an idea or enterprise. They willingly assume responsibility for the success or failure of a venture and are answerable for all its facets.

Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote: Success follows doing what you want to do. There is no other way to be successful.

Author: Wilferd Peterson
Quote: Walk with the dreamers, the believers, the courageous, the cheerful, the planners, the doers, the successful people with their heads in the clouds and their feet on the ground. Let their spirit ignite a fire within you to leave this world better than when you found it...

Author: Jerry Lewis
Quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.

Author: Jerry Lewis
Quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: And will you succeed? Yes indeed, yes indeed! Ninety-eight and three-quarters percent guaranteed!

Author: Jimmy Chamberlin
Quote: My brother and I had a real love-hate relationship with my success. There was some bitterness there that I didn't understand until recently, but I told him that if I ever did a record I wanted him to play on it.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: One of the most spiritual things you can do is embrace your humanity. Connect with those around you today. Say, "I love you", "I'm sorry", "I appreciate you", "I'm proud of you"...whatever you're feeling. Send random texts, write a cute note, embrace your truth and share it...cause a smile today for someone else...and give plenty of hugs.

Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote: Well, I do feel that I carry the responsibility of representing my country wherever I am, and this responsibility came with the success that I had in last couple of years, not just myself but the whole group of tennis players that comes from Serbia. And athletes in general are, in this moment, the biggest ambassadors that our country has.

Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

Author: Niccol Machiavelli
Quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.

Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote: In most things success depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: People tend to be generous when sharing their nonsense, fear, and ignorance. And while they seem quite eager to feed you their negativity, please remember that sometimes the diet we need to be on is a spiritual and emotional one. Be cautious with what you feed your mind and soul. Fuel yourself with positivity and let that fuel propel you into positive action.

Author: T. D. Jakes
Quote: I raised five children. They all have different personalities. All of them have different issues, different levels of success. That was a learning experience for me.

Author: Rosalind Russell
Quote: Success is a public affair. Failure is a private funeral.

Author: Winston S. Churchill
Quote: To each there comes in their lifetime a special moment when they are figuratively tapped on the shoulder and offered the chance to do a very special thing, unique to them and fitted to their talents. What a tragedy if that moment finds them unprepared or unqualified for that which could have been their finest hour.

Author: Chris Farley
Quote: I used to think that you could get to a level of success where the laws of the universe didn't apply. But they do. It's still life on life's terms, not on movie-star terms. I still have to work at relationships. I still have to work on my weight and some of my other demons.

Author: Rani Mukerji
Quote: I'm not bothered about what people say behind my back. I don't need to know about it. I believe in living my life and doing my work. God will give you success. And even if He doesn't, there's a lesson to be learnt.

Author: Monte Irvin
Quote: I'm a forgiver. I might not forget, but I forgive. My mother, father and older brother always told me: 'Don't hold grudges. If you do that, you don't lower yourself down to your adversary. Just treat people the way you want to be treated.' I honestly think that's why I was able to survive and have some success.

Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote: Success is getting what you want..Happiness is wanting what you get.

Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote: Super-ambitious goals tend to be unifying and energizing to people; but only if they believe there's a chance of success.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle.

Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not.

Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote: I'm a very competitive person, but competitive with myself. I want to be the best that I can be, and if that means that I'm eventually better than everyone else, then so be it. But I don't go around comparing and contrasting myself with other actors if I can help it. It's also, I think, the key to my success.

Author: Michael Korda
Quote: Success has always been easy to measure. It is the distance between one's origins and one's final achievement.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

Author: Bethenny Frankel
Quote: I thought doing reality TV would be the greatest success of my life or the biggest mistake.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.

Author: William Ellery Channing
Quote: How easy to be amiable in the midst of happiness and success.

Author: Marina and the Diamonds
Quote: There's no one particular road that will lead you to success. I think everybody will find it differently.

Author: Kenny Marchant
Quote: I wish the Peace Corps and its volunteers continued success and perseverance. We are grateful for their contributions to society and dedication to providing assistance where it is needed. May the Peace Corps continue its legacy of service, both at home and abroad.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. When you change for the better, the people around you will be inspired to change also....but only after doing their best to make you stop. Live your truth and don't EVER stop.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: The good news is that the moment you decide that what you know is more important than what you have been taught to believe, you will have shifted gears in your quest for abundance. Success comes from within, not from without.

Author: Steven Weber
Quote: The flaw in, say, austerity, is that its success is predicated on the relative exactitude of math rather than the shifting, liquid imperfection of people's lives.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.

Author: Henri Matisse
Quote: An artist must never be a prisoner. Prisoner? An artist should never be a prisoner of himself, prisoner of style, prisoner of reputation, prisoner of success, etc.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: Don't mistake activity with achievement.

Author: Katy Perry
Quote: I'm either going to go completely mental, completely bankrupt, or have the best success of my life.

Author: Booker T. Washington,  Up From Slavery: An Autobiography
Quote: I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed.

Author: Soledad O'Brien
Quote: There are thousands of inspirational stories waiting to be told about young women who yearn for a great education. They are stories of struggle and stories of success, and they will inspire others to take action and work to change lives.

Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote: The keys to brand success are self-definition, transparency, authenticity and accountability.

Author: Ben Carson,  Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story
Quote: Success is determined not by whether or not you face obstacles, but by your reaction to them. And if you look at these obstacles as a containing fence, they become your excuse for failure. If you look at them as a hurdle, each one strengthens you for the next.

Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote: When I finish a picture I don't show it to anyone if I feel it's not good enough yet. I've learnt to listen to my partners and my friends. For me it's the biggest success if they like it.

Author: Albio Sires
Quote: Middle class families are struggling to send their sons and daughters to school. For many Americans, a college education is essential to future success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be aliveto breathe, to think, to enjoy, to lovethen make that day count!

Author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering: You can be successful
Quote: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.

Author: Jim Henson,  It's Not Easy Being Green: And Other Things to Consider
Quote: If you care about what you do and work hard at it, there isn't anything you can't do if you want to.

Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote: The man who has really won the love of one good woman in this world, I do not care if he dies in the ditch a beggar - his life has been a success.

Author: Ben Mendelsohn
Quote: I don't believe in the transformation myth, where if you have more success, life changes for you.

Author: D. Simone
Quote: May Light always surround you;Hope kindle and rebound you.May your Hurts turn to Healing;Your Heart embrace Feeling.May Wounds become Wisdom;Every Kindness a Prism.May Laughter infect you;Your Passion resurrect you.May Goodness inspire your Deepest Desires.Through all that you Reach For, May your arms Never Tire.

Author: Sharad Pawar
Quote: I am fully aware that everybody has a right to succeed, and success should be with ethics.

Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote: Israel was not created in order to disappear - Israel will endure and flourish. It is the child of hope and the home of the brave. It can neither be broken by adversity nor demoralized by success. It carries the shield of democracy and it honors the sword of freedom.

Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote: Tell me, why is the media here so negative? Why are we in India so embarrassed to recognise our own strengths, our achievements? We are such a great nation. We have so many amazing success stories but we refuse to acknowledge them. Why?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: The universe doesnt give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.

Author: Brad Pitt
Quote: Success is a beast. And it actually puts the emphasis on the wrong thing. You get away with more instead of looking within.

Author: Richard Branson
Quote: Well, I think that there's a very thin dividing line between success and failure. And I think if you start a business without financial backing, you're likely to go the wrong side of that dividing line.

Author: Preity Zinta
Quote: There will always be competition, especially in showbiz. There's always someone younger and hungrier standing behind you; there's always someone with more contacts; there's always someone whose grandfather or father is a filmmaker. I think your job is just to be there 100% - you work hard, and there are no shortcuts to success.

Author: Robert T. Kiyosaki,  Rich Dad, Poor Dad
Quote: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.

Author: Helen Gurley Brown
Quote: My success was not based so much on any great intelligence but on great common sense.

Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote: Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.

Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote: There is nothing more difficult to take in hand, more perilous to conduct, or more uncertain in its success, than to take the lead in the introduction of a new order of things.

Author: Roopleen
Quote: If you have a dream, dont just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: Management is efficiency in climbing the ladder of success; leadership determines whether the ladder is leaning against the right wall.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way

Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote: Those who cannot work with their hearts achieve but a hollow, half-hearted success that breeds bitterness all around.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres,  Seriously... I'm Kidding
Quote: When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.

Author: Steven Wright
Quote: If at first you don't succeed, destroy all evidence that you tried.

Author: Arianna Huffington
Quote: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimes - understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.

Author: Alfred Adler
Quote: No experience is a cause of success or failure. We do not suffer from the shock of our experiences, so-called trauma - but we make out of them just what suits our purposes.

Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote: I believe any success in life is made by going into an area with a blind, furious optimism.

Author: Julie Benz
Quote: You really have to work hard and apply yourself and by applying yourself and working hard and being diligent, you can achieve success.

Author: Heather Bresch
Quote: There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure.

Author: Lionel Messi
Quote: You cannot allow your desire to be a winner to be diminished by achieving success before and I believe there is room for improvement in every sportsman.

Author: Alfred North Whitehead
Quote: No one who achieves success does so without acknowledging the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.

Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.

Author: Kathy Ireland
Quote: If we get our self-esteem from superficial places, from our popularity, appearance, business success, financial situation, health, any of these, we will be disappointed, because no one can guarantee that we'll have them tomorrow.

Author: Ralph Marston
Quote: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self.

Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.

Author: Sigmund Freud,  Civilization and Its Discontents
Quote: It is impossible to escape the impression that people commonly use false standards of measurement  that they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and that they underestimate what is of true value in life.

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: Success in life is founded upon attention to the small things rather than to the large things; to the every day things nearest to us rather than to the things that are remote and uncommon.

Author: James Allen
Quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Im just going to keep plugging away until I find successor an electrical socket that works. This is the secret to gaining worldly power.

Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote: Whenever you have taken up work in hand, you must see it to the finish. That is the ultimate secret of success. Never, never, never give up!

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: In a person's career, well, if you're process-oriented and not totally outcome-oriented, then you're more likely to be success. I often say 'pursue excellence, ignore success.' Success is a by-product of excellence.

Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote: Israel was not created in order to disappear - Israel will endure and flourish. It is the child of hope and the home of the brave. It can neither be broken by adversity nor demoralized by success. It carries the shield of democracy and it honors the sword of freedom.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Possessions, outward success, publicity, luxury - to me these have always been contemptible. I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best for both the body and the mind.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: When you connect to the silence within you, that is when you can make sense of the disturbance going on around you.

Author: Robert Greene,  The 48 Laws of Power
Quote: Keep your friends for friendship, but work with the skilled and competent

Author: Junot Daz,  The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao
Quote: Success, after all, loves a witness, but failure can't exist without one.

Author: Sam Harris
Quote: The conflict between religion and science is inherent and (very nearly) zero-sum. The success of science often comes at the expense of religious dogma; the maintenance of religious dogma always comes at the expense of science.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Just an observation: it is impossible to be both grateful and depressed. Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.

Author: Vivek Wadhwa
Quote: Corporate executives and business owners need to realize that there can be no compromise when it comes to ethics, and there are no easy shortcuts to success. Ethics need to be carefully sown into the fabric of their companies.

Author: Lyndon B. Johnson
Quote: Our purpose in Vietnam is to prevent the success of aggression. It is not conquest, it is not empire, it is not foreign bases, it is not domination. It is, simply put, just to prevent the forceful conquest of South Vietnam by North Vietnam.

Author: Joshua Waitzkin
Quote: The moment we believe that success is determined by an ingrained level of ability as opposed to resilience and hard work, we will be brittle in the face of adversity.

Author: Tyler Perry
Quote: My biggest success is getting over the things that have tried to destroy and take me out of this life. Those are my biggest successes. It has nothing to do with work.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.

Author: William Osler
Quote: The very first step towards success in any occupation is to become interested in it.

Author: Robert Strauss
Quote: Success is a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you're tired. You quit when the gorilla is tired.

Author: Bernard Branson
Quote: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.

Author: Amelia Earhart
Quote: I want to do it because I want to do it. Women must try to do things as men have tried. When they fail, their failure must be but a challenge to others.

Author: Eva Longoria
Quote: I got my degree. More importantly, I got a key to American opportunity. That's who we are - a nation that rewards ambition with opportunity. Where hard work can lead to success, no matter where you start.

Author: Andrew Lloyd Webber
Quote: What strikes me is that there's a very fine line between success and failure. Just one ingredient can make the difference.

Author: Virgil
Quote: Fortune sides with him who dares.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: There are many aspects to success; material wealth is only one component. ...But success also includes good health, energy and enthusiasm for life, fulfilling relationships, creative freedom, emotional and psychological stability, a sense of well-being, and peace of mind.

Author: Chesty Puller
Quote: My definition, a definition in the drill books from the time that General Von Steuben wrote the regulations for General George Washington, the definition of the object of military training is success in battle... It wouldn't be any sense to have a military organization on the backs of the American taxpayers with any other definition.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: 30% of the time I am successful 70% of the time. Thats 100% in my booka book that happens to have a page count thats 21% Reduced Fat.

Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote: I wonder how many times people give up just before a breakthrough - when they are on the very brink of success.

Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote: Success means we go to sleep at night knowing that our talents and ablities were used in a way that served others.

Author: Rickey Henderson
Quote: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success.

Author: Michael Jordan
Quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.

Author: Henry J. Heinz
Quote: To do a common thing uncommonly well brings success.

Author: Jonathan Winters
Quote: I couldn't wait for success, so I went ahead without it.

Author: Bren Brown,  The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are
Quote: Understanding the difference between healthy striving and perfectionism is critical to laying down the shield and picking up your life. Research shows that perfectionism hampers success. In fact, it's often the path to depression, anxiety, addiction, and life paralysis.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.

Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote: Like the British Constitution, she owes her success in practice to her inconsistencies in principle.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.

Author: Sidney Sheldon,  The Other Side of Midnight
Quote: To be successful you need friends and to be very successful you need enemies.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: Vision without execution is just hallucination.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.

Author: David Icke
Quote: A friend at school was always being laughed at because his father emptied dustbins for a living. But those who laughed worshipped famous footballers. This is an example of our topsy-turvy view of 'success.' Who would we miss most if they did not work for a month, the footballer or the garbage collector?

Author: Thomas Wolfe
Quote: You have reached the pinnacle of success as soon as you become uninterested in money, compliments, or publicity.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.

Author: Tony DeLiso,  Legacy: The Power Within
Quote: Happiness is part of who we are. Joy is the feeling

Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote: Success is...knowing your purpose in life,growing to reach your maximum potential, andsowing seeds that benefit others.

Author: David Chang
Quote: I constantly think I'm a fraud - that this success is not warranted or justified.

Author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
Quote: To be independent of public opinion is the first formal condition of achieving anything great.

Author: Robert Browning
Quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.

Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote: Accepting oneself does not preclude an attempt to become better.

Author: Navjot Singh Sidhu
Quote: Nobody travels on the road to success without a puncture or two.

Author: Anna Pavlova
Quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: that's the secret of success.

Author: Reba McEntire
Quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funnybone.

Author: Bobbe Sommer
Quote: Having a low opinion of yourself is not 'modesty.' It's self-destruction. Holding your uniqueness in high regard is not 'egotism.' It's a necessary precondition to happiness and success.

Author: Robert Falcon Scott
Quote: I may not have proved a great explorer, but we have done the greatest march ever made and come very near to great success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.

Author: Rick Astley
Quote: My success set me up for life, and it meant that I could retire from the music industry at 27 to spend time with my newborn daughter and my wife. My time away from the spotlight allowed me to rediscover my love for music, and I'm doing it for me now and no one else.

Author: Christina Aguilera
Quote: The roughest roads often lead to the top.

Author: George Burns
Quote: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you don't think you need to develop your personal brand, my advice for you comes in the wisdom of two road signs: STOP; DEAD END.

Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.

Author: Victor Kiam
Quote: An entrepreneur assumes the risk and is dedicated and committed to the success of whatever he or she undertakes.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Stop trying to 'fix' yourself; you're NOT broken! You are perfectly imperfect and powerful beyond measure.

Author: Roopleen,  Words to inspire the winner in YOU
Quote: Dont let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.

Author: Martha Stewart
Quote: Without an open-minded mind, you can never be a great success.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise

Author: Milla Jovovich
Quote: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.

Author: Matthew McConaughey
Quote: We dissect failure a lot more than we dissect success.

Author: Beverly Sills
Quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you dont try.

Author: Bill Gates
Quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.

Author: Salvador Dal
Quote: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Title is Invisible
Quote: Its what you do in your free time that will set you freeor enslave you.

Author: Ernest Istook
Quote: Instead of this confusion, we need the unifying force of an official language, English, which is the language of success in America.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Judging is preventing us from understanding a new truth. Free yourself from the rules of old judgments and create the space for new understanding.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The greatest love stories are not those in which love is only spoken, but those in which it is acted upon.

Author: James Garner
Quote: I don't take success very well, because I know it's fleeting. And the next day, it can all fall apart. I know that, too. So I don't get too high, and I don't get too low. You get through the world a lot easier that way.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the mext moment

Author: George S. Patton Jr.
Quote: The test of success is not what you do when you are on top. Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.

Author: Shelby Foote
Quote: My second book, Follow Me Down had some success, got good critical notices, went into a second printing and things like that, but Shiloh was by far the most successful of those first five novels.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Happy people produce. Bored people consume.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Don't blow off another's candle for it won't make yours shine brighter.

Author: Denise Juneau
Quote: My parents told me that education was the path to success - and they showed me, taking me to Head Start while they were pursuing their own college degrees.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Our way of thinking creates good or bad outcomes.

Author: Adrien Brody
Quote: My dad told me, 'It takes fifteen years to be an overnight success', and it took me seventeen and a half years.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres,  Seriously... I'm Kidding
Quote: It's failure that gives you the proper perspective on success.

Author: John Barry
Quote: If you have a successful run, everything comes to you. Nothing succeeds like success.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quote: If youre in the luckiest one per cent of humanity, you owe it to the rest of humanity to think about the other 99 per cent.

Author: Vinod Khosla
Quote: Seeking an acquisition from the start is more than just bad advice for an entrepreneur. For the entrepreneur it leads to short term tactical decisions rather than company-building decisions and in my view often reduces the probability of success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.

Author: Simon Mainwaring
Quote: Refuse to accept the belief that your professional relevance, career success or financial security turns on the next update on the latest technology. Sometimes it's good to put the paddle down and just let the canoe glide.

Author: Douglas Pagels
Quote: Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life. The secret of success is in turning that diary into the best story you possibly can.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Love yourself. Forgive yourself. Be true to yourself. How you treat yourself sets the standard for how others will treat you.

Author: Michael Korda
Quote: The freedom to fail is vital if you're going to succeed. Most successful people fail from time to time, and it is a measure of their strength that failure merely propels them into some new attempt at success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Fear can only grow in darkness. Once you face fear with light, you win.

Author: Roberto Cavalli
Quote: Sometimes, because of my success, I am afraid that I was not a good father. With the first two I was too strong, and with the other three I was too weak.

Author: Richard Feynman,  Surely You're Joking, Mr. Feynman!: Adventures of a Curious Character
Quote: All the time you're saying to yourself, 'I could do that, but I won't,'  which is just another way of saying that you can't.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationships poison.

Author: Eiichiro Oda
Quote: Inherited Will, The Destiny of the Age, and The Dreams of the People. As long as people continue to pursue the meaning of Freedom, these things will never cease to be!"- Gol D. Roger

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: You have a unique gift to offer this world. Be true to yourself, be kind to yourself, read and learn about everything that interests you and keep away from people who bring you down. When you treat yourself kindly and respect the uniqueness of those around you, you will be giving this world an amazing gift... YOU!

Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote: It's the price of success: people start to think you're omnipotent.

Author: Doug Larson
Quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

Author: Bob Dylan
Quote: Act the way you'd like to be and soon you'll be the way you'd like to act.

Author: Robin S. Sharma
Quote: I believe we can accelerate our acumen, performance and success by leveraging our associations and spending time with people better than us.

Author: Stephen Richards,  Releasing You from Fear
Quote: When your back is to the wall and you are facing fear head on, the only way is forward and through it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?

Author: Suzy Kassem
Quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Men are born to succeed, not to fail.

Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote: I always envisioned myself being a rapper and being in the game and having success, but you never know what it feels like or how you're going to be when you're there.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Judgment is a negative frequency.

Author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich
Quote: The way of success is the way of continuous pursuit of knowledge.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The victim mindset dilutes the human potential. By not accepting personal responsibility for our circumstances, we greatly reduce our power to change them.

Author: Suge Knight
Quote: The best revenge in the world is success.

Author: Niccol Machiavelli
Quote: Whosoever desires constant success must change his conduct with the times.

Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote: Fame is something that is bestowed upon you because of success. Success is something you have to chase.

Author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free
Quote: Success will be within your reach only when you start reaching out for it.

Author: Bruce Feirstein
Quote: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.

Author: Dwayne Johnson
Quote: I like the idea of working in different genres and transcending genres and hopefully finding success, and ultimately make movies people like.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You can't just wish change; you have to live the change in order for it to become a reality.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.

Author: John Andreas Widtsoe,  In a Sunlit Land
Quote: Decide what you want to be....Pay the Price ...And be what you want to be.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Every single time you help somebody stand up you are helping humanity rise.

Author: Tommy Shaw
Quote: Success is fickle, but creativity is a gift.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Don't give up! It's not over. The universe is balanced. Every set-back bears with it the seeds of a come-back.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Your life is a print-out of your thoughts.

Author: Walt Disney Company
Quote: I do not like to repeat successes I like to go on to other things.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Are you going to allow the world around you to change while you remain stagnant? Make this the time you throw away old habits that have hindered your happiness and success and finally allow your greatest self to flourish.

Author: Robert Greene,  The 48 Laws of Power
Quote: Strike the shepherd and the sheep will scatter

Author: Denis Waitley
Quote: Our limitations and success will be based, most often, on your own expectations for ourselves. What the mind dwells upon, the body acts upon.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: To succeed in the world it is not enough to be stupid - one must also be polite.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.

Author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year
Quote: You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.

Author: Robert Kiyosaki
Quote: If you look at anyone who has achieved great success and wealth, people like Warren Buffett, Oprah Winfrey, or Lance Armstrong, they have all focused intensely in order to win.

Author: Tsugumi Ohba,  Bakuman, Volume 3: Debut and Impatience
Quote: There are going to be times when you learn more about the world youre entering and feel defeated when you see the gap between the ideal and the reality But thats something well all face. The people that face those obstacles and overcome them are people whose dreams come true.

Author: John Ortberg,  The Me I Want to Be: Becoming God's Best Version of You
Quote: If you can't do great things, Mother Teresa used to say, do little things with great love. If you can't do them with great love, do them with a little love. If you can't do them with a little love, do them anyway.Love grows when people serve.

Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote: The only guarantee for failure is to stop trying

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Its a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different ifYou pretended those around you were deaf to your words? Let today be the dayYou let your actions speak and communicate your feelings and intentions.

Author: Mitt Romney
Quote: In every stump speech I give, I speak about the fact that people who dream and achieve enormous success do not make us poorer - they make us better off.

Author: Jordan Belfort,  The Wolf of Wall Street
Quote: Act as if! Act as if you're a wealthy man, rich already, and then you'll surely become rich. Act as if you have unmatched confidence and then people will surely have confidence in you. Act as if you have unmatched experience and then people will follow your advice. And act as if you are already a tremendous success, and as sure as I stand here today - you will become successful.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.

Author: Dorothy Day
Quote: Don't worry about being effective. Just concentrate on being faithful to the truth.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: No matter how small you start, always dream big.

Author: Anna Quindlen
Quote: If your success is not on your own terms, if it looks good to the world but does not feel good in your heart, it is not success at all.

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: There are no secrets to success: dont waste time looking for them. Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty to those for whom you work, and persistence.

Author: Warren Beatty
Quote: You've achieved success in your field when you don't know whether what you're doing is work or play.

Author: Jean Vanier,  Community And Growth
Quote: I am struck by how sharing our weakness and difficulties is more nourishing to others than sharing our qualities and successes.

Author: Alan Greenspan
Quote: I have found no greater satisfaction than achieving success through honest dealing and strict adherence to the view that, for you to gain, those you deal with should gain as well.

Author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich
Quote: A quitter never wins-and-a winner never quits.

Author: Alexandre Dumas,  The Three Musketeers
Quote: The merit of all things lies in their difficulty.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I am not a victim. No matter what I have been through, I'm still here. I have a history of victory.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Before you can successfully make friends with others, first you have to become your own friend.

Author: Vince Lombardi Jr.
Quote: The real glory is being knocked to your knees and then coming back. That's real glory. Thats the essence of it.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be. If we do our best, we are a success.

Author: Jose Mourinho
Quote: But I think it's more normal for my team to have no success than it is to win two consecutive European cups.

Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote: The way to screw up somebody's life is to give them what they want.

Author: Charles Bukowski,  Factotum
Quote: People don't need love. What they need is success in one form or another. It can be love but it needn't be.

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: Do not sit still; start moving now. In the beginning, you may not go in the direction you want, but as long as you are moving, you are creating alternatives and possibilities.

Author: Samantha Young,  On Dublin Street
Quote: Sure it could get rough sometimes, but life wasn't a Hollywood movie. Shit happened. You fought, you screamed, and somehow you worked like hell to get out the other side still intact.

Author: Lorii Myers
Quote: The power behind taking responsibility for your actions lies in putting an end to negative thought patterns. You no longer dwell on what went wrong or focus on whom you are going to blame. You don't waste time building roadblocks to your success. Instead, you are set free and can now focus on succeeding.

Author: Lance Armstrong,  It's Not About the Bike: My Journey Back to Life
Quote: Anyone who imagines they can work alone winds up surrounded by nothing but rivals, without companions. The fact is, no one ascends alone.

Author: Denis Waitley
Quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.

Author: Roopleen,  Words to inspire the winner in YOU
Quote: The worlds greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focussed on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.

Author: Anita Roddick
Quote: There is no scientific answer for success. You can't define it. You've simply got to live it and do it.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Life always begins with one step outside of your comfort zone.

Author: Will Rogers
Quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.

Author: Dannii Minogue
Quote: Everyone has determination - it's a question of how you use it. Hers is based on power and success and conquering; she doesn't care what she has to do or who gets hurt in the process. In that way we're very, very different.

Author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free
Quote: Happiness is something we reap from the seeds we sow. Plant misery seeds and that us what you reap.

Author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb,  The Black Swan: The Impact of the Highly Improbable
Quote: Missing a train is only painful if you run after it! Likewise, not matching the idea of success others expect from you is only painful if thats what you are seeking.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: When you know what you want, and you want it bad enough, you'll find a way to get it.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Don't set your goals by what other people deem important.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: Success is not obtained overnight. It comes in installments; you get a little bit today, a little bit tomorrow until the whole package is given out. The day you procrastinate, you lose that day's success.

Author: Charles J. Givens
Quote: To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past.

Author: Madeleine Albright,  Madam Secretary: A Memoir
Quote: I was taught to strive not because there were any guarantees of success but because the act of striving is in itself the only way to keep faith with life.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Your success and happiness lie in you.

Author: Babe Ruth
Quote: Never allow the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game!

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Do not dilute the truth of your potential. We often convince ourselves that we cannot change, that we cannot overcome the circumstances of our lives. That is simply not true. You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life. But you can't just wish it, you can't just hope it, you can't just want it... you have to LIVE it, BE it, DO it.

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: Cultivate an optimistic mind, use your imagination, always consider alternatives, and dare to believe that you can make possible what others think is impossible.

Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote: We fall forward to succeed.

Author: J. E. McCulloch
Quote: No other success can compensate for failure in the home.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: You've been given the innate power to shape your life...but you cannot just speak change, you have to LIVE change. Intent paired with action builds the bridge to success. You can't just want it; you have to do it, live it...BE it! Success isn't something you have, it's something you DO!

Author: LeBron James,  Shooting Stars
Quote: Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.

Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote: Success is like death. The more successful you become, the higher the houses in the hills get and the higher the fences get.

Author: Mario Andretti
Quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but its determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Equal Rites
Quote: ...it is well known that a vital ingredient of success is not knowing that what you're attempting can't be done.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Youre frustrated because you keep waiting for the blooming of flowers of which you have yet to sow the seeds.

Author: Anthony Robbins
Quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.

Author: Craig Ferguson,  American on Purpose: The Improbable Adventures of an Unlikely Patriot
Quote: He will know from and early age that failure is not disgrace. It's just a pitch that you missed, and you'd better get ready for the next one. The next one might be the shot heard round the world. My son and I are Americans, we prepare for glory by failing until we don't.

Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: It sometimes takes a state of solitude to bring to mind the real power of companionship.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Life itself is simple...it's just not easy.

Author: Mary Kay Ash
Quote: Pretend that every single person you meet has a sign around his or her neck that says, "Make me feel important."Not only will you succeed in sales, you will succeed in life.

Author: Joe Namath
Quote: If you're not gonna go all the way, why go at all?

Author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot
Quote: The success and the failure are not my concern, but His.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I am so grateful for my troubles. As I reflect back on my life, I have come to realize that my greatest triumphs have been born of my greatest troubles.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You are where you are right now because of the actions you've taken, or maybe, the inaction you've taken.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Stop giving meaningless praise and start giving meaningful action.

Author: Nathan W. Morris
Quote: Edit your life frequently and ruthlessly. It's your masterpiece after all.

Author: Elias Canetti
Quote: Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper. Success is one day's insolence.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: You are forgiven for your happiness and your successes only if you generously consent to share them.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The only real battle in life is between hanging on and letting go.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: The line between failure and success is so fine. . . that we are often on the line and do not know it.

Author: Joel Osteen
Quote: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Learn from your history, but dont live in it.

Author: Carroll Bryant
Quote: I never fail. It's just that the people around me succeed more than I.

Author: Kresley Cole
Quote: The bottom line is, insults only hurt when they come from someone I respect.

Author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year
Quote: Courage to me is doing something daring, no matter how afraid, insecure, intimidated, alone, unworthy, incapable, ridiculed or whatever other paralyzing emotion you might feel. Courage is taking action.....no matter what. So you're afraid? Be afraid. Be scared silly to the point you're trembling and nauseous, but do it anyway!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Stop blaming outside circumstances for your inside chaos.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome,

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book
Quote: Nearly' only counts in horseshoes and hand-grenades.

Author: Daisaku Ikeda,  Discussions on Youth
Quote: I cannot say this too strongly: Do not compare yourselves to others. Be true to who you are, and continue to learn with all your might.

Author: Temitope Owosela
Quote: Sky is not a limit for me; because I have no limit for myself in life. Because life is a world full of risk taking and possibilities. No matter how hard or easy life is; I will always find a way to enjoy myself; even in the mist of circumstances; because problems is a sense of adventure in sheep's clothing.

Author: Vernon Howard
Quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really WANT is only what you really NEED.

Author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild
Quote: According to the moral absolutism that characterizes McCandless's beliefs, a challenge in which a successful outcome is assured isn't a challenge at all.

Author: Barbra Streisand
Quote: Success to me is having ten honeydew melons and eating only the top half of each slice.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Return of the King
Quote: We set out to save the Shire, Sam and it has been saved - but not for me.

Author: Antonio Machado
Quote: I dreamt -- marvellous error! -- that I had a beehive here inside my heart. And the golden bees were making white combs and sweet honey from my old failures.

Author: Mia Hamm
Quote: Take your victories, whatever they may be, cherish them, use them, but don't settle for them.

Author: Leena Ahmad Almashat,  Harmony Letters
Quote: Those who don't jump will never fly.

Author: Victoria Principal
Quote: Success doesn't mean that you are healthy, success doesn't mean that you're happy, success doesn't mean that you're rested. Success really doesn't mean that you look good, or feel good, or are good.

Author: Jordan Belfort
Quote: When you live your life by poor standards, you inflict damage on everyone who crosses your path, especially those you love.

Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote: When you go in search of honey, you must expect to be stung by bees.

Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote: Success is getting what you want; happiness is wanting what you get.

Author: Michelle Obama
Quote: One of the lessons that I grew up with was to always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals. And so when I hear about negative and false attacks, I really don't invest any energy in them, because I know who I am.

Author: Christopher Morley
Quote: There is only one success-to be able to spend life in your own way.

Author: Samuel Goldwyn
Quote: From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you.

Author: Mia Hamm
Quote: The backbone of success is...hard work, determination, good planning, and perserverence.

Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote: We have forty million reasons for failure, but not a single excuse.

Author: Victoria Addino
Quote: Never run from the enemy, tackle them

Author: Swami Sivananda
Quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

Author: Ben Sweetland
Quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: Like poetry, fashion does not state anything. It merely suggests

Author: Tim Fargo
Quote: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.

Author: Derrick A. Bell,  Ethical Ambition: Living a Life of Meaning and Worth
Quote: We live in a system that espouses merit, equality, and a level playing field, but exalts those with wealth, power, and celebrity, however gained.

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: At any given moment the choice to be happy is present- we just have to choose to be happy.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Free yourself from the burden of feeling the need to hold on to anything. Let go you are a part of everything.

Author: Clarissa Pinkola Ests,  Women Who Run With the Wolves: Myths and Stories of the Wild Woman Archetype
Quote: Failure is a greater teacher than success

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: Fashion does not have to prove that it is serious. It is the proof that intelligent frivolity can be something creative and positive

Author: James Surowiecki
Quote: Lack of confidence, sometimes alternating with unrealistic dreams of heroic success, often leads to procrastination, and many studies suggest that procrastinators are self-handicappers: rather than risk failure, they prefer to create conditions that make success impossible, a reflex that of course creates a vicious cycle.

Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote: The secret to success is constancy of purpose.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: NEVER be surprised by your own success!

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: When you fail, that is when you get closer to success.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Its not about working for money, its about having money work for you.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept
Quote: Fortunate are those who take the first steps.

Author: George Washington
Quote: My mother was the most beautiful woman I ever saw. All I am I owe to my mother. I attribute all my success in life to the moral, intellectual and physical education I received from her.

Author: Will Smith
Quote: There's no reason to have a plan B because it distracts from plan A.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: We may place blame, give reasons, and even have excuses; but in the end, it is an act of cowardice to not follow your dreams.

Author: Rick Bragg
Quote: It is a common condition of being poor...you are always afraid that the good things in your life are temporary, that someone can take them away, because you have no power beyond your own brute strength to stop them.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Your life begins to change the day you take responsibility for it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Gods word is not just to be heard and repeated, it is to be breathed, lived, and emulated with each action.

Author: David D. Burns
Quote: Perfection' is man's ultimate illusion. It simply doesn't exist in the universe.... If you are a perfectionist, you are guaranteed to be a loser in whatever you do.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Make the choice to embrace this day. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the ghost of yesterday or the "To-Do"list of tomorrow! Its inspiring to see all the wonderfully amazing things that can happen in a day in which you participate.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: As Aristotle said, 'Excellence is a habit.' I would say furthermore that excellence is made constant through the feeling that comes right after one has completed a work which he himself finds undeniably awe-inspiring. He only wants to relax until he's ready to renew such a feeling all over again because to him, all else has become absolutely trivial.

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote: Our business in life is not to succeed, but to continue to fail in good spirits.

Author: Pele
Quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: I peed on the floor to get hired. Now Im the janitor.

Author: Martina Boone,  Compulsion
Quote: It doesn't matter how great your shoes are if you don't accomplish anything in them.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Be an opener of doors

Author: Colin Powell
Quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

Author: Harper Lee
Quote: You rarely win, but sometimes you do.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You cannot continue on the same path and arrive at a different destination. Make the choice to have your actions reflect your goals.

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Stop allowing your day-to-day life to be clouded by busy nothingness.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: While intent is the seed of manifestation, action is the water that nourishes the seed. Your actions must reflect your goals in order to achieve true success.

Author: Chris Brady
Quote: No guts, no story.

Author: Solomon Ortiz
Quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Don't wait for other people to be loving, giving, compassionate, grateful, forgiving, generous, or friendly... lead the way!

Author: Warren Buffett
Quote: You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don't do too many things wrong.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: If you dont know exactly where youre going, how will you know when you get there?

Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The most important thing is this: to sacrifice what you are now for what you can become tomorrow.

Author: Walter Scott
Quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.

Author: Abbie Hoffman
Quote: There is absolutely no greater high than challenging the power structure as a nobody, giving it your all, and winning!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Your dream is a reality that is waiting for you to materialize. Today is a new day! Dont let your history interfere with your destiny! Learn from your past so that it can empower your present and propel you to greatness

Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote: Success is a great deodorant.

Author: Ezra Pound
Quote: With one day's reading a man may have the key in his hands.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Live your vision and demand your success.

Author: Charles Dickens,  Great Expectations
Quote: So, I must be taken as I have been made. The success is not mine, the failure is not mine, but the two together make me.

Author: Rick Pitino
Quote: Humility is the true key to success. Successful people lose their way at times. They often embrace and overindulge from the fruits of success. Humility halts this arrogance and self-indulging trap. Humble people share the credit and wealth, remaining focused and hungry to continue the journey of success.

Author: Brad Szollose
Quote: If you really want the key to success, start by doing the opposite of what everyone else is doing.

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: Learn to adapt. Things change, circumstances change. Adjust yourself and your efforts to what it is presented to you so you can respond accordingly. Never see change as a threat, because it can be an opportunity to learn, to grow, evolve and become a better person.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long. Remember, success is something you experience when you act accordingly.

Author: Rick Ross
Quote: How many people you bless is how you measure success

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Stop just cheering for others who are living their visions. Commit yourself to your own success and follow the steps required to achieve it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Stop pointing fingers and placing blame on others. Your life can only change to the degree that you accept responsibility for it.

Author: Bob Feller
Quote: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Today, many will choose to live free of conditions and rules governing their own happiness. Why not you? Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions! Today's a new day!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Stop waiting for the perfect day or the perfect moment... Take THIS day, THIS moment and lead it to perfection.

Author: Laura Kasischke
Quote: Writing is really just a matter of writing a lot, writing consistently and having faith that you'll continue to get better and better. Sometimes, people think that if they don't display great talent and have some success right away, they won't succeed. But writing is about struggling through and learning and finding out what it is about writing itself that you really love.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: If you think you can then you can.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: Go as far as you can see and you will see further.

Author: Max Planck,  Where is Science Going?
Quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.

Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Most men either compromise or drop their greatest talents and start running after, what they perceive to be, a more reasonable success, and somewhere in between they end up with a discontented settlement. Safety is indeed stability, but it is not progression.

Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote: Why are you going to choose failure when success is an option?

Author: Alexandre Dumas
Quote: A person who doubts himself is like a man who would enlist in the ranks of his enemies and bear arms against himself. He makes his failures certain by himself being the first person to be convinced of it.

Author: Spencer Johnson,  Who Moved My Cheese?
Quote: It is safer to search in the maze than to remain in a cheeseless situation

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: When you experience a negative circumstance or event, do not dwell on it. Be proactive  put your attention on what you need to do to bring the situation to a positive result.

Author: John C. Maxwell,  Your Road Map for Success: You Can Get There from Here
Quote: Happiness simply cannot be relied upon as a measure of success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The universe doesn't give you what you want in your mind; it gives you what you demand with your actions.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Interrupt your thoughts of "I should", with your action of doing.

Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote: The secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: One may not always know his purpose until his only option is to monopolize in what he truly excels at. He grows weary of hearing the answer 'no' time and time again, so he turns to and cultivates, monopolizes in his one talent which others cannot possibly subdue. Then, beyond the crowds of criticism and rejection, the right people recognize his talent - among them he finds his stage.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Each new friend gives rise to the possibility of anything!

Author: Winston S. Churchill
Quote: Sure I am this day we are masters of our fate, that the task which has been set before us is not above our strength; that its pangs and toils are not beyond our endurance. As long as we have faith in our own cause and an unconquerable will to win, victory will not be denied us.

Author: Marlon Wayans
Quote: Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on. Being successful means that you're working hard and walking your walk every day. You can only live your dream by working hard towards it. That's living your dream.

Author: Natalie Goldberg,  Writing Down the Bones: Freeing the Writer Within
Quote: Play around. Dive into absurdity and write. Take chances. You will succeed if you are fearless of failure.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Although goals are important, having a plan of action is vital to the success of those goals. Having a goal with no plan of action is like wanting to travel to a new destination without having a map.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: The bird dares to break the shell, then the shell breaks open and the bird can fly openly. This is the simplest principle of success. You dream, you dare and and you fly.

Author: Lorii Myers,  Make It Happen, A Healthy, Competitive Approach to Achieving Personal Success
Quote: Sometimes not getting what you want is a brilliant stroke of luck.

Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy ideal

Author: Lillian Cauldwell
Quote: To become successful, one must put themselves in the paths of giants!

Author: A.A. Milne,  Not That It Matters
Quote: Almost anyone can be an author; the business is to collect money and fame from this state of being.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: You will find the key to success under the alarm clock.

Author: Isobelle Carmody,  The Keeping Place
Quote: Sometimes success demands a certain refined insanity.

Author: Og Mandino,  The Greatest Salesman in the World
Quote: Never feel shame for trying and failing for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Clear: A Guide to Treating Acne Naturally
Quote: Be patient. Your skin took a while to deteriorate. Give it some time to reflect a calmer inner state. As one of my friends states on his Facebook profile: "The true Losers in Life, are not those who Try and Fail, but those who Fail to Try.

Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think. So start each day by thinking of all the things you have to be thankful for. Your future will depend very largely on the thoughts you think today. So think thoughts of hope and confidence and love and success.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Be a King. Dare to be Different, dare to manifest your greatness.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Your agreement with reality defines your life.

Author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich
Quote: I will eliminate hatred, envy, jealousy, selfishness, and cynicism, by developing love for all humanity, because I know that a negative attitude toward others can never bring me success. I will cause others to believe in me, because I will believe in them, and in myself.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Start shaping your own day. Start walking your own walk. This journey is yours, take charge of it. Stop giving other people the power to shape your life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The empowered woman is powerful beyond measure and beautiful beyond description.

Author: Harshit Walia
Quote: Whole life is a search for beauty. But, when the beauty is found inside, the search ends and a beautiful journey begins.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.
Quote: Do I attribute my success to hard work, or sunscreen? If you want the truth, maybe you should ask my new albino secretary.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: When we give up the chase, we give up our wishing.

Author: Tommy Hilfiger
Quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Today is the only day in which we have any power.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You are beautiful. Your beauty, just like your capacity for life, happiness, and success, is immeasurable.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: Stuff your brain with knowledge.

Author: Marilyn Suttle
Quote: Moods can be contagious. Don't catch or spread a bad mood.

Author: Po Bronson
Quote: If you want to give yourself a fair chance to succeed, never expect too much too soon

Author: Chris Hadfield,  An Astronaut's Guide to Life on Earth
Quote: Early success is a terrible teacher. You're essentially being rewarded for a lack of preparation, so when you find yourself in a situation where you must prepare, you can't do it. You don't know how.

Author: Debra Anastasia,  Poughkeepsie
Quote: Don't tie your success to anything other than what's inside you

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: If you do not have persistence then no amount of education, talent or genius can make up for it.

Author: Winston S. Churchill
Quote: It's no use saying, "We are doing our best."You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I havent spent my time trying to duplicate my success. But only because I havent had any yet.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Change is in the air. This change reminds us that we are made and beautifully sculpted by the same power that orchestrates the change of season. Let this be the season you embrace and align yourself with this change.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Participate in your own dreams, dont just say what you want or complain about what you dont have.

Author: Rensis Likert
Quote: The greater the loyalty of a group toward the group, the greater is the motivation among the members to achieve the goals of the group, and the greater the probability that the group will achieve its goals.

Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Life is a balanced system of learning and evolution. Whether pleasure or pain; every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Don't live to be judged for what you haven't done. Live to be judged for what you have done.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation.

Author: Drew Sidora
Quote: I love 'Braxton Family Values!' I love seeing a strong family unit striving for success while dealing with everyday struggles like everyone else. Whatever drama they find themselves in, they find a way to solve it and get back to the importance of family. A positive show for sure.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Free yourself from the complexities of your life! A life of simplicity and happiness awaits you.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: There is no try. There is only do.

Author: Ali Shariati
