Quote: I like Dancing of Indian girls more than my parents prayers . Because they dance with love and passion . But my parents just say their prayers because they got used to it .

Author: Anna Pavlova
Quote: When a small child, I thought that success spelled happiness. I was wrong, happiness is like a butterfly which appears and delights us for one brief moment, but soon flits away.

Author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra
Quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Start with big dreams and make life worth living.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: How many a man has thrown up his hands at a time when a little more effort, a little more patience would have achieved success.

Author: Maxwell Maltz
Quote: You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Stop lying to yourself. When we deny our own truth, we deny our own potential.

Author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering: You can be successful
Quote: Doing the tough things sets winners apart from losers.

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: It may take little time to get where you want to be, but if you pause and think for a moment, you will notice that you are no longer where you were. Do not stopkeep going.

Author: Christy Raedeke,  The Daykeeper's Grimoire
Quote: ...If there is no risk, there is no reward.

Author: Robert T. Kiyosaki,  Cashflow Quadrant: Rich Dad's Guide to Financial Freedom
Quote: Success is a poor teacher

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it's something you do.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Do you love yourself enough to BE what you love yourself enough to WANT?

Author: Johann Sebastian Bach
Quote: What I have achieved by industry and practice, anyone else with tolerable natural gift and ability can also achieve.

Author: Maurice Young
Quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: A confident woman wears a smile and has this air of comfortability and pleasantness about her.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: All that you are is all around you.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.

Author: Myles Munroe,  Understanding Your Potential
Quote: ...success is not a comparison of what we have done with what others have done.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Let today be the day you stop having conflict between your actions and your goals and finally align your greatest intent with your purposeful actions, creating a universal symphony serenading your success!

Author: Nathan W. Morris
Quote: The speed of your success is limited only by your dedication and what you're willing to sacrifice

Author: Walter Pater,  The Renaissance: Studies in Art and Poetry
Quote: To burn always with this hard gemlike flame, to maintain this ecstasy, is success in life.

Author: Harvey Mackay
Quote: Ego stops you from getting things done and getting people to work with you. That's why I firmly believe that ego and success are not compatible.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: When we lose our spiritual child then that is when we have grown old.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Dream your dream; and realize that you are more than just the dreamer, you are the point of origin for its reality.

Author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich
Quote: Youve got to be sure of yourself beforeYou can ever win a prize.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: A lack of clarity could put the brakes on any journey to success.

Author: Chris Hardwick
Quote: No human ever became interesting by not failing. The more you fail and recover and improve, the better you are as a person. Ever meet someone whos ALWAYS had EVERYTHING work out for them with ZERO struggle? They usually have the depth of a puddle. Or they dont exist.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: What do you think will be more effective when it comes to succeeding, believing you can or KNOWING you will? Let today be the last day you took timid steps of belief and start taking confident steps of purpose-driven knowing!

Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote: Flaming enthusiasm, backed by horse sense and persistence, is the quality that most frequently makes for success.

Author: Arnold Palmer
Quote: Success in golf depends less on strength of body than upon strength of mind and character.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: We were all born equal, but where we are in life now is of our own making.

Author: Betty Friedan
Quote: You can have it all, just not all at the same time.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: The way to wealth is as plain as the way to market. It depends chiefly on two words, industry and frugality: that is, waste neither time nor money, but make the best use of both. Without industry and frugality nothing will do, and with them everything.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: The road to success is always under construction.

Author: Tommy Newberry,  Success is Not an Accident: Change Your Choices Change Your Life
Quote: If you want to lead an extraordinary life, find out what the ordinary doand don't do it.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Ultimate prosperity is one's value within. It takes a man of depth, morality, and charm to be envied yet without a sign of wealth or romance. A passion to prove such inner worth is his permission to achieve whatever he desires.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: The French say you get hungry when youre eating, and I get inspired when Im working. Its my engine

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: When you know love then that is the time you forget hate.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Instead, shake things up today! Live through today. Dont just exist through it - LIVE through it!

Author: T. Scott McLeod
Quote: Success doesn't come to you; you go to it.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying basic fundamentals.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Too much action with too little intent makes for wasteful exertion of energy and the confusion between movement and progress.

Author: James Cameron
Quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: There is nothing worse for the lying soul than the mirror of reality.

Author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza
Quote: If you feel obsessed to prove something to the world, then you'd need world attention to be able to prove it.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Live in this moment ... for it is the only moment we have!

Author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year
Quote: Just pick a goal and stick to itno big complicated secret.

Author: Anthony Robbins
Quote: Success is doing what you want to do, when you want, where you want, with whom you want, as much as you want.

Author: Rob Liano
Quote: If you think someone or something other than yourself is responsible for your happiness or success, I'd guess you're not that happy or successful.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: We must transcend the illusion that money or power has any bearing on our worthiness as children of God.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Don't die without fulfilling your purpose.

Author: Hyman G. Rickover
Quote: Success teaches us nothing; only failure teaches.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you truly embrace your human impermanence you connect with the power you have, and influence you have, over the time you have.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Unless you know where you are going then you will not know how to get there.

Author: George Henry Lewes
Quote: The delusions of self-love cannot be prevented, but intellectual misconceptions as to the means of achieving success may be corrected.

Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.

Author: Tiger Woods
Quote: No matter how good you get you can always get better, and that's the exciting part.

Author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year
Quote: What you perceive as a failure today may actually be a crucial step towards the success you seek. Never give up.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Free yourself from the inauthenticity and disempowerment of your story.

Author: Charles T. Munger
Quote: To get what you want, you have to deserve what you want. The world is not yet a crazy enough place to reward a whole bunch ofundeserving people.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If at first you dont succeed, youre doing it wrong. Learn from the experience. Try again, but with a different approach.

Author: Robin S. Sharma
Quote: Success is not a function of the size of your title but the richness of your contribution.

Author: Conrad Hilton
Quote: Success ... seems to be connected with action. Successful men keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.

Author: Jill Shalvis,  The Sweetest Thing
Quote: For some unknown reason, success usually occurs in private, while failure occurs infull view.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: The only thing limiting your aspiration is your imagination.

Author: John Calvin,  Institutes of the Christian Religion
Quote: No one can travel so far that he does not make some progess each day. So let us never give up. Then we shall move forward daily in the Lord's way. And let us never despair because of our limited success. Even though it is so much less than we would like, our labour is not wasted when today is better than yesterday!

Author: Shannon A. Thompson,  Seconds Before Sunrise
Quote: Remember how far youve come, and you wont have to rely on a destiny for your future. It will come on your own.

Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you establish a destination by defining what you want, then take physical action by making choices that move you towards that destination, the possibility for success is limitless and arrival at the destination is inevitable.

Author: Jimmy Carter,  Our Endangered Values: America's Moral Crisis
Quote: I believe that anyone can be successful in life, regardless of natural talent or the environment within which we live. This is not based on measuring success by human competitiveness for wealth, possessions, influence, and fame, but adhering to God's standards of truth, justice, humility, service, compassion, forgiveness, and love.

Author: Gary Player
Quote: We create success or failure on the course primarily by our thoughts.

Author: Tony Evans
Quote: Success is not what you have done compared to what others have done. Success is what you have done compared to what you were supposed to do.

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: To do more for the world than the world does for you - that is success.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Without friends you have nothing!

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: The true test of one's mettle is how many times you will try before you give up.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: It is easier for one to take risks and to chase his dreams with a mindset that he has nothing to lose. In this lies the immense passion, the great advantage of avoiding a materialistic, pleasure-filled way of life.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: The tragedy is that what you disapprove of in others is the very thing you disapprove of in yourself.

Author: Will Rodgers,  The Wit and Wisdom of Will Rogers in His Own Voice
Quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life and you lead.

Author: Betsey Johnson
Quote: Real success is being totally indulgent about your own trip. You put your blinders on about the garbage and go full speed ahead.

Author: Will Rogers
Quote: If you want to be successful, it's just this simple. Know what you are doing. Love what you are doing. And believe in what you are doing.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: There is a difference between talented people and gifted people.Talented people are good AT something; Gifted people ARE that something.

Author: Joe Strummer
Quote: People can change anything they want to, and that means everything in the world.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: Have you found someone to share your heart with? Are you giving to your community? Are you at peace with yourself? Are you trying to be as human as you can be?

Author: Charles F. Glassman,  Brain Drain The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life
Quote: Some say if you want success surround yourself with successful people. I say if you want true and lasting success surround yourself with people of integrity.

Author: Arsene Wenger
Quote: A manager is a guide. He takes a group of people and says, 'With you I can make us a success; I can show you the way.'

Author: Michael Flynn,  Eifelheim
Quote: Any fool can hope when success lies plainly in view. It wants genuine strength to hope when matters are hopeless.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: Men love women who are courageous for it means they can go all the way with him in his pursuit of his good dreams and intentions.

Author: Mollie Marti
Quote: Listen for the call of your destiny, and when it comes, release your plans and follow.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: INTENT reveals desire; ACTION reveals commitment.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The people we consider successful in our society are all people that seize every moment and make the best of each situation.

Author: Kanye West
Quote: Success is the best revenge.

Author: Gerard de Marigny,  The Watchman of Ephraim
Quote: Success can be defined in many ways but failure in only one ... quitting!

Author: Vaclav Havel
Quote: Hope is a state of mind, not of the world. Hope, in this deep and powerful sense, is not the same as joy that things are going well, or willingness to invest in enterprises that are obviously heading for success, but rather an ability to work for something because it is good.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: No matter what the cause, God is only as willing as you are.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson
Quote: Do you wait for things to happen, or do you make them happen yourself? I believe in writing your own story.

Author: Roopleen
Quote: To turn your dreams into reality, all your resources, efforts and concentration should be aligned in the same direction.

Author: Steven Redhead,  The Solution
Quote: The difference between Success and failure is not giving up.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: If you have to ask if youve done enough, you havent. Each day brings with it the opportunity to do more than you did yesterday.

Author: Bobby Orr
Quote: There are no environments where you're only going to win, because life just isn't like that.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Luck is a word the bitter teach to the ignorant.

Author: Confucius
Quote: When you have faults, do not fear to abandon them.

Author: Tiger Woods
Quote: if you gone come in second, you're just the first loser!

Author: Steven Moffat
Quote: You have to take your own bold approach, and if you do you will be rewarded with success. Or calamitous failure. That can happen too.

Author: Ron Jaworski
Quote: Positive thinking is the key to success in business, education, pro football, anything that you can mention. I go out there thinking that I'm going to complete every pass.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: This moment is yours and yours alone! Take charge, seize this moment and allow it to propel you to the high levels of an empowered life. Allow upon this fertile moment to be planted the seeds of your happiness and success.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Dare to be different. Represent your maker well and you will forever abide in the beautiful embrace of his loving arms.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: God is never tired of bringing the sun out every morning, taking it in the evenings and bringing out the moon.

Author: Matsuri Hino,  Vampire Knight, Vol. 16
Quote: No matter how dim the light filtering through the trees is, you can still try your best to grasp it. -Kaien Cross

Author: Marilyn Suttle
Quote: When you give appreciation IN ORDER TO get something it's manipulation and people can sense it. Appreciate genuinely.

Author: Marilyn Suttle
Quote: Notice the difference between being in control and needing control.

Author: Timothy Ferriss
Quote: The fishing is best where the fewest go and the collective insecurity of the world makes it easy for people to hit home runs while everyone is aiming for base hits.

Author: Thomas Fowell Buxton
Quote: With ordinary talent and extraordinary perseverance, all things are attainable

Author: Toni Sorenson
Quote: Success goes to the ones who do. Get up. Show up. Throw up if you have to. Do it afraid, but do it no matter.

Author: Criss Jami,  Salom: In Every Inch In Every Mile
Quote: Every man has a specific skill, whether it is discovered or not, that more readily and naturally comes to him than it would to another, and his own should be sought and polished. He excels best in his niche - originality loses its authenticity in one's efforts to obtain originality.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Action is the universal language of success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Challenges in life can either enrich you or poison you. You are the one who decides.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Your words are powerful so what you say goes a long way to either establish or destroy you; this is why you should say things that God has said concerning you, not things that situations or circumstances say.

Author: Stephen Richards,  The Ultimate Cosmic Ordering Meditation
Quote: Even when in the midst of disturbance, the stillness of the mind can offer sanctuary.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: Chanel is an institution, and you have to treat an institution like a whore  and then you get something out of her

Author: Og Mandino,  The Greatest Salesman in the World
Quote: My dreams are worthless, my plans are dust, my goals are impossible.All are of no value unless they are followed by action.

Author: Tom Peters
Quote: The whole secret to our success is being able to con ourselves into believing that we're going to change the world because statistically we are unlikely to do it.

Author: Tim Fargo
Quote: Opportunity doesn't make appointments, you have to be ready when it arrives.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: When the actions becomes frequent than the words, success becomes heavier than the dreams. Do more, say less.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: You have had a dream for so many years. Let today be the day you make a plan for it. Just think about how much more likely you are to hit your target when you finally aim at it.

Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

Author: Adam Savage
Quote: Failure is always an option

Author: Kristi Bowman
Quote: The more we see ourselves as a vibrant, successful, inspiring person who boldly declares and manifests her vision, the more we become just that.

Author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza
Quote: If there were a master of stupidity in this world, I would really love to listen to his success story.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: It is important that when we make a resolution, or establish a goal, that we take the ACTION necessary to accomplish that goal.

Author: Bertolt Brecht
Quote: Why be a man when you can be a success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: My life changed the day I moved beyond just wishing for things and I started earning them. That is the day I learned that we don't get what we wish for, we get what we work for.

Author: Habeeb Akande
Quote: The difference between greed and ambition is a greedy person desires things he isn't prepared to work for.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Dont dare to dream big, just dream BIG!

Author: Mike Norton,  White Mountain
Quote: The true measure of a man is not what he dreams, but what he aspires to be; a dream is nothing without action. Whether one fails or succeeds is irrelevant; all that matters is that there was motion in his life. That alone affects the world.

Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.

Author: Sri Chinmoy
Quote: If failure has the strength to turn your life into bitterness itself, then patience has the strength to turn your life into the sweetest joy. Do not surrender to fate after a single failure. Failure, at most, precedes success.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Don't nourish your fears more than you nourish your hopes.

Author: Toni Sorenson
Quote: How we feel is not who we are. We might feel like failures, but as long as we are still trying, we are not failures. We are works in progress.

Author: Jared Diamond,  Collapse: How Societies Choose to Fail or Succeed
Quote: Two types of choices seem to me to have been crucial in tipping the outcomes [of the various societies' histories] towards success or failure: long-term planning and willingness to reconsider core values. On reflection we can also recognize the crucial role of these same two choices for the outcomes of our individual lives.

Author: Joey Adams
Quote: Rockefeller once explained the secret of success. 'Get up early, work late - and strike oil.'

Author: Lincoln Patz
Quote: Before the fruits of prosperity can come, the storms of life need to first bring the required rains of testing, which mixes with the seeds of wisdom to produce a mature harvest.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Recognize that throughout this beautiful day,you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go.

Author: Clarissa Pinkola Ests,  Women Who Run With the Wolves: Myths and Stories of the Wild Woman Archetype
Quote: Don't waste your time hating a failure. Failure is a greater teacher than success. Listen, learn, go on.

Author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success
Quote: Success is a decision, not a gift.

Author: Jeffrey Gitomer
Quote: Becoming well known (at least among your prospects & connections) is the most valuable element in the connection process.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Beyond Good and Evil
Quote: Success has always been the greatest liar - and the "work"itself is a success; the great statesman, the conqueror, the discoverer is disguised by his creations, often beyond recognition; the "work,"whether of the artist or the philosopher, invents the man who has created it, who is supposed to have create it; "great men,"as they are venerated, are subsequent pieces of wretched minor fiction

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: If we lose all of our wealth and are only left with love then, indeed, we shall never be poor.

Author: Candace Bushnell,  Lipstick Jungle
Quote: It was ironic, but when you scratched the surface, most successful men were working for one thing only--to retire--and the sooner the better. Whereas women were the complete opposite. She had never heard a woman say she was working so she could retire to a desert island or to live on a boat. It was probably, she thought, because most women didn't think they deserved to do nothing.

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: Erase self-doubt by working to build your strengths instead of focusing on your weaknesses.

Author: Thomas Merton,  No Man Is an Island
Quote: A man who fails well is greater than one who succeeds badly.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Each day gives the opportunity for you to be treated right, to feel worthy, and to be successful. Its a choice you have to make, a faith you have to embrace, and a standard you have to set.

Author: Roman Payne,  Rooftop Soliloquy
Quote: Rich will be my life if I can keep my memories full and brimming, and record them on clear-eyed mornings while I set joyously to work setting pen to holy craft.

Author: David Brent
Quote: If at first you don't succeed, remove all evidence you ever tried.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: You are human, so stop acting as if though you are a sheep and start thinking for yourself.

Author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success
Quote: There are three types of people in this world. Firstly, there are people who make things happen. Then there are people who watch things happen. Lastly, there are people who ask, what happened? Which do you want to be?

Author: K.L. Toth
Quote: Powerful words come with powerful intent. Where you have passion, strength, courage, and determination you can accomplish anything!

Author: Melissa Bean
Quote: Married couples who work together to build and maintain a business assume broad responsibilities. Not only is their work important to our local and national economies, but their success is central to the well-being of their families.

Author: Temitope Owosela
Quote: Hope and faith goes hand-in-hand, because without hope there is no faith. The same goes with want and needs, without any wants, there no need to have a need

Author: Steve Pavlina
Quote: Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: Bad luck with women is a determined man's road to success. For every affliction, he makes, out of indignation, yet another advancement in order to exceed the man that the woman chose over him. This goes to show that great men are made great because they once learned how to fight the feeling of rejection.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: What is success? It is being able to go to bed each night with your soul at peace

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: In the autumn of your years don't make it so that what you look back on is regret. Live your life now so that whatever you do gives some sunshine before you head into the winter of your life.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Today I am even richer.

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you have to overcome to reach your goals.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: It is in doing things and not reading about them that results come about.

Author: Bobby Orr
Quote: Forget about style; worry about results.

Author: Arundhati Roy
Quote: It is true that success is the most boring thing, it is tinny and brittle, failure runs deeper. Success is dangerous. I have a very complicated relationship with that word.

Author: George Clooney
Quote: My father ran for Congress in 2004, and I got a sense that there is no way to achieve much success without a certain amount of compromise.

Author: Jonathan Cainer
Quote: They say you should know your limits and work within them. But how can you really know your limits unless you try to expand them?

Author: Napoleon Hill,  Success Through A Positive Mental Attitude
Quote: You become what you think about

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: If life didnt give you at least one person not wanting you to succeed then half of us would lose are motivation to climb that cliff, in order to prove them wrong.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: If you really want to eat, keep climbing. The fruits are on the top of the tree. Stretch your hands and keep stretching them. Success is on the top, keep going.

Author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich
Quote: The only limitation is that which one sets up in one's own mind.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Academ's Fury
Quote: Isana felt her throat tighten. "We failed."Serai lifted her chin and patted Isana's arm firmly."We have not yet succeeded. There is a difference.

Author: Jos Ortega y Gasset
Quote: We do not live to think, but, on the contrary, we think in order that we may succeed in surviving.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Intent without dedicated action is simply not enough. Action without a clear intent is a waste. It is when these two powerful forces are aligned that the energy of the universe conspires in your favor.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: The universe doesnt give you what you ask for with your thoughts; it gives you what you demand with your actions. In essence, you don't get what you WANT, you get what you ARE.

Author: Anthony Robbins,  Unlimited Power: The New Science Of Personal Achievement
Quote: A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: Once you can write an alphabet, you can write a book of 100 million pages. It's just a matter of believing it as possible, and taking the cross millimetre by millimetre.

Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote: There is no evidence that success in business will make us happy people or allow us to have happy families.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: One does not have to be a philosopher to be a successful artist, but he does have to be an artist to be a successful philosopher. His nature is to view the world in an unpredictable albeit useful light.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Everything is easier said than done. Wanting something is easy. Saying something is easy. The challenge and the reward are in the doing.

Author: Temitope Owosela
Quote: If you want good luck; you must go out there and search for that luck!! Because luck is waiting for you to look for it.

Author: Fadi Hattendorf
Quote: Love, as life, is a journey. Finding true love for the ever after is an amazing achievement.

Author: Tana French,  Broken Harbor
Quote: I don't do that kind of negativity. If you put your energy into thinking about how much the fall would hurt, you're already halfway down.

Author: Thomas Merton,  No Man Is an Island
Quote: Who is willing to be satisfied with a job that expresses all his limitations? He will accept such work only as a 'means of livelihood' while he waits to discover his 'true vocation'. The world is full of unsuccessful businessmen who still secretly believe they were meant to be artists or writers or actors in the movies.

Author: Lorii Myers,  Make It Happen, A Healthy, Competitive Approach to Achieving Personal Success
Quote: Once you figure out what you want in lifeexpect nothing less.

Author: Lights Poxlietner
Quote: You have to be uncomfortable in order to be successful, in some ways. If you stay in your comfort zone! You would never do the things that you need to do.

Author: Mary Lydon Simonsen,  The Perfect Bride for Mr. Darcy
Quote: Determination, effort, and practice are rewarded with success.

Author: Michelle Sagara West,  Cast In Courtlight
Quote: Success and failure are two edges of the same blade, two sides of the same coin. To fear one is to forever deny the possibility of the other.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Don't call yourself discouraged anymore;it's no longer your name.

Author: Will Ferrell
Quote: I think with the success of, like, every summer there has been a couple R-rated comedies that have done so well; I think it is so nice to see that people are turning out to see these movies, and it doesn't seem to be as big a stigma with the studios anymore.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: You are the point of origin for everything in your world: you set the standard for yourself.

Author: Roopleen
Quote: Quitting is never an option on the road to success. Find the way forward. If you have a positive mindset and are willing to persevere, there is little that is beyond your reach. The attitude of being ready to work even in the face of challenges and despite odds is what will make all the difference in your life.

Author: Gloria Steinem,  My Life on the Road
Quote: If you find yourself drawn to an event against all logic, go. The universe is telling you something.

Author: Dejan Stojanovic
Quote: Busy with the ugliness of the expensive success We forget the easiness of free beautyLying sad right around the corner, Only an instant removed, Unnoticed and squandered.

Author: Herb True
Quote: Many people succeed when others do not believe in them. But rarely does a person succeed when he does not believe in himself.

Author: Prem Rawat
Quote: We think a wise person is someone who solves problems. Truth is, a wise person is someone who avoids problems.

Author: Alexandra Ripley
Quote: Should-haves solve nothing. It's the next thing to happen that needs thinking about.

Author: Lorii Myers,  Make It Happen, A Healthy, Competitive Approach to Achieving Personal Success
Quote: No one can take the shot for you.

Author: Lionel Messi
Quote: I'm lucky to be part of a team who help to make me look good, and they deserve as much of the credit for my success as I do for the hard work we have all put in on the training ground.

Author: Ogor Winnie Okoye
Quote: practice only envisioning yourself at the finish line and be unrelenting and fervent in racing towards that finish line. Undue preoccupation and fixation with the how's, whens, and what ifs will not only derail and further distance you from your destination, but will also feed your mind with those fatal seeds of doubt that make failure inevitable"~ Awaken and Unleash your Victor

Author: Marilyn Suttle
Quote: People who work in an environment where doing their best is recognized have a better chance of feeling good about their work.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Some of the most powerful speeches I have given have been delivered in the dedicated silence of my actions.

Author: Sherry Thomas,  The Burning Sky
Quote: The success of my rule does not rely on my ability to recite obscure Latin verse.

Author: Steve Goodier
Quote: Leaving what feels secure behind and following the beckoning of our hearts doesn't always end as we expect or hope. We may even fail. But here's the payoff: it can also be amazing and wonderful and immensely satisfying.

Author: Sukant Ratnakar,  Open the Windows
Quote: Do not get obsolete like an old technology, keep innovating yourself.

Author: Destiny Booze
Quote: Prepare yourself for success. You have to see it coming to get there.

Author: Leighton Meester
Quote: Success to me is being happy, truly fulfilled, being proud of myself, and doing different things all the time.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Rise to the challenge of bringing your dreams to life! Do not be discouraged by resistance, be nourished by it. Success is the experience of rising to the level of your true greatness.

Author: Mollie Marti
Quote: Lineage, personality, and environment may shape you, but they do not define your full potential.

Author: Daphne du Maurier,  The "Rebecca"Notebook: And Other Memories
Quote: Living as we do in an age of noise and bluster, success is now measured accordingly. We must all be seen, and heard, and on the air.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: The time has come to harness the blessed power within us and to use it to transcend from our current existence into a more empowered reality.

Author: Bryant McGill
Quote: A person who makes few mistakes makes little progress.

Author: Kevin Michel,  Moving Through Parallel Worlds To Achieve Your Dreams
Quote: Small shifts in your thinking, and small changes in your energy, can lead to massive alterations of your end result.

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: If one felt successful, there'd be so little incentive to be successful.

Author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success
Quote: Too often, people get stuck in a state of over-thinking, the result is that they never reach a decision.

Author: John Forbes Nash, Jr.
Quote: Though I had success in my research both when I was mad and when I was not, eventually I felt that my work would be better respected if I thought and acted like a 'normal' person.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: It's not always what we don't know that gets in our way; sometimes it's what we think we know that keeps us from learning.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: An intelligent woman is a goldmine! She has the ability to learn, reason and understand things better and faster than her contemporaries. She is competent, alert and can reason out stuffs easily.

Author: Noel DeJesus
Quote: There is no tomorrow and there was no yesterday; if you truly want to accomplish your goals you must engulf yourself in today.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self esteem. They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud.

Author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"
Quote: Success is not determined by the outcome. The outcome is the result of having already decided that you are successful to begin with.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: A knock down has never been a knockout unless you allow it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I dont write books so that you can be fascinated with me. I write them so you can be fascinated with YOU!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Once you understand how powerful you are within, you exponentially increase the power and potentiality of everything outside of you.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: Success nullifies. You then have to do it again, preferably differently

Author: Bernard Kelvin Clive
Quote: The secret code of success is patience,a virtue that can not be replaced. It takes time to build great dreams.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Without enthusiasm then what we have surrounded ourselves with becomes worthless.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Where would his torture be, indeed, if at every step the hope of succeeding upheld him?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: If you can transcend from the dark rut of disempowered thinking to the bright light of an empowered agreement with reality, you will see opportunities not barriers. You will see the finish line, not the hurdles.

Author: Denis Waitley
Quote: You must learn from your past mistakes, but not lean on your past successes.

Author: Samuel Smiles
Quote: We learn wisdom from failure much more than from success. We often discover what will do, by finding out what will not do; and probably he who never made a mistake never made a discovery.

Author: J.M. Dattilo
Quote: It's impossible to walk through solid rock... You have to walk between the molecules that make up the rock.

Author: Christopher Stocking
Quote: Nothing makes a person desire improvement like failure

Author: Chef Jiro
Quote: You must immerse yourself in your work. You have to fall in love with your work  You must dedicate your life to mastering your skill. Thats the secret of success.

Author: Rob Liano
Quote: Achieving success is a challenge but so is struggling so you may as well choose success.

Author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success
Quote: It is never about who is right or wrong, it is about what is best.

Author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success
Quote: Like everything in life, it is not what happens to you but how you respond to it that counts.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu
Quote: Never allow your desires to lead you away from God; allow nothing else to control you other than God and His Word. No matter what you see or pass through, dont allow them to define you.

Author: Garth Stein,  The Art of Racing in the Rain
Quote: Because memory is time folding back on itself. To remember is to disengage from the present. In order to reach any kind of success in automobile racing, a driver must never remember.

Author: Michael Lewis,  The Big Short: Inside the Doomsday Machine
Quote: the lesson of Buffett was: To succeed in a spectacular fashion you had to be spectacularly unusual.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Youve been given the innate power to shape your life.

Author: Stella Oladiran,  Winning Formulas
Quote: Friendship is not by force but by choice.You can never please everybody, he who aims to please everybody will end up pleasing nobody.

Author: Samael Aun Weor
Quote: Whoever submits himself to a super-discipline can expect great triumphs.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Tomorrow will never call to ask your opinion; you don't control it. Stop allowing today's possibilities to be robbed by tomorrow's insecurities.

Author: Timothy Keller,  Generous Justice: How God's Grace Makes Us Just
Quote: If you have money, power, and status today, it is due to the century and place in which you were born, to your talents and capacities and health, none of which you earned. In short, all your resources are in the end the gift of God.

Author: Ian Fleming,  Moonraker
Quote: He shrugged his shoulders to shift the pain of failure---the pain that is so much greater than the pleasure of success.

Author: Alan Autry
Quote: Every city across the country that has successfully renewed and revitalized itself points to a robust education system as its fundamental key to success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: We need more than just the Law of Attraction. We need to connect with its more successful twin, the Law of Generosity. And further entwine ourselves with their parent; the Law of Love.

Author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana
Quote: Separate yourself from those who hinder your vision. Make a choice to walk away from the trap set to ensnare you. Realize when someone is pulling you backwards every time you take a step forward. Separate from them and the result of your action will be a life of success.

Author: Mollie Marti,  Walking with Justice: Uncommon Lessons from One of Life's Greatest Mentors
Quote: With every choice you create the life youll live; with every decision you design it.

Author: Yvonne Pierre,  The Day My Soul Cried: A Memoir
Quote: Stop worrying about someone taking your spot. God already have it reserved. Do the work to get there and fill it!

Author: Robert W. Service
Quote: No man can be a failure if he thinks he's a success; If he thinks he is a winner, then he is.

Author: Charles Colton
Quote: When we fail, our pride supports us, and when we succeed it betrays us.

Author: Will Rogers
Quote: Even if you are on the right track, but just sit there, you will still get run over.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: For me, Chanel is like music. There are certain notes and you have to make another tune with them

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: The ultimate story of success: When a nobody, who has never once in his entire life known the feeling of being remembered or respected, suddenly snaps and becomes a world dictator. On one hand it sounds just, but on the other, it illustrates the reason why a prosperity message has and needs its limitations.

Author: Moss Hart,  Act One
Quote: The only credential the city asked was the boldness to dream. For those who did, it unlocked its gates and its treasures, not caring who they were or where they came from.

Author: Mark Cain
Quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: I wish success could be ordered like delivery pizza, because Id order take out.

Author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes
Quote: For some people, their fear to lose is greater than their desire to succeed, so they end up doing nothing and their dreams become impossible.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: It's no shame in reaching second or third base if you aimed for first base.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Weigh whatever you are about to say; what will it do to your hearer - encouragement, edification, disappointment or fear? What will it do to your life - glorify, edify, beautify or weigh you down? Speak well and things will go well.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Don't let any situation intimidate you anymore, don't accept defeat anymore.

Author: Charles Luckman
Quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks and courage.

Author: Edith Wharton,  The Custom of the Country
Quote: Her failure was a useful preliminary to success.

Author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
Quote: I am highly offended by the total lack of acknowledgement of my contribution to Laker success.

Author: Simon Zingerman,  We All Need Heroes: Stories of the Brave and Foolish
Quote: Using your talent, hobby or profession in a way that makes you contribute with something good to this world is truly the way to go.

Author: Sanhita Baruah
Quote: It is not as much about who you used to be, as it is about who you choose to be.

Author: C. Moorer,  From Failure to Promise: An Uncommon Path to Professoriate
Quote: One often has to do what they have to do in order to do what they want to do; however if you only do what you want to do then you will never do what you have to do!

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Get out of your own way stop the paralysis by analysis decide what you want, create a simple plan, and get moving!

Author: Steven Redhead,  The Solution
Quote: Success is realising the true joy and wonder of life can only be yours if you follow your own intuition, aiming to achieve your bliss.

Author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!
Quote: WINNER:is A Runner who Wins Inspite Of Ninety Nine ExcellentRunners!

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: If you have a success you have it for the wrong reasons. If you become popular it is always because of the worst aspects of your work.

Author: Bryant McGill
Quote: Do not let your grand ambitions stand in the way of small but meaningful accomplishments.

Author: Israelmore Ayivor
Quote: You cannot score a goal when you are sitting on the bench. To do so, you have to dress up and enter the game.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: BREAKING NEWS: You're awesome and designed for success; live this day accordingly!

Author: Mollie Marti
Quote: Integrity is a powerful force, keeping you alive to others long after youve left their presence.

Author: Marilyn Suttle
Quote: When youre busy, avoid taking the quickest action. Instead make the extra effort to truly serve the customer.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Just like your body and lifestyle can be healthy or unhealthy, the same is true with your beliefs. Your beliefs can be your medicine or your poison.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: Pessimists never go on a voyage of discovery, equally so they never leave the shoreline in search of new horizons.

Author: Julien Smith,  The Flinch
Quote: Success works as a cycle - growth and contraction, balancing and unbalancing - all while you're encountering hurdles that get higher and higher over time.

Author: Josh Billings
Quote: Success does not consist in never making blunders, but in never making the same one a second time.

Author: A.L. Kennedy
Quote: Have more humility. Remember you don't know the limits of your own abilities. Successful or not, if you keep pushing beyond yourself, you will enrich your own life  and maybe even please a few strangers.

Author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free
Quote: One who swims with the tide and not the other side will benefit from the opportunity that flows.

Author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free
Quote: Beliefs are not related to religion but they are basically about who you are.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Victory does not come to cowards;it comes to the brave ones.

Author: John Steinbeck,  The Winter of Our Discontent
Quote: Strength and success - they are above morality, above criticism. It seems, then, that it is not what you do, but how you do it and what you call it. Is there a check in men, deep in them, that stops or punishes? There doesn't seem to be. The only punishment is for failure. In effect no crime is committed unless a criminal is caught.

Author: Tanya Tucker
Quote: I don't know what keeps me going. Sometimes I wonder... I think it's just pure perseverance and wanting to succeed and having that burning desire to always have success.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.

Author: Russell Simmons
Quote: The key ingredient to any kind of happiness or success is to never give less than your best

Author: Bryant McGill
Quote: Ambition is not what a man would do, but what a man does, for ambition without action is fantasy.

Author: Lawrence Durrell,  Justine
Quote: I suppose the secret of his success is in his tremendous idleness which almost approaches the supernatural.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Do the best you can, with what you can, while you can, and success in inevitable.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: When we are connected to the source, we will not be afraid of any task set before us.

Author: Evelyn Waugh,  Vile Bodies
Quote: Success in this world depends on knowing exactly how little effort each job is worth...distribution of energy...

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Our moral economy went bankrupt long before our financial one.

Author: L. Frank Baum
Quote: Stunt dwarf or destroy the imagination of a child and you have taken away its chances of success in life. Imagination transforms the commonplace into the great and creates the new out of the old.

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: When faced with a hurdle then give it all you've got to jump over it because it can't be done in two stages.

Author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success
Quote: The first step is the most important. It is the most crucial and the most effective as it will initiate the direction you have chosen.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper
Quote: Dominate in your domain; You can do it.

Author: Tim Tebow
Quote: If I believe that I became the best quarterback that I could possibly be, the best football player that I could possibly be... That's how I'm going to measure my career as a success or not.

Author: Simon Zingerman,  We All Need Heroes: Stories of the Brave and Foolish
Quote: That is why enemies can be great motivators. They serve as fuel for your fire.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invicible host against difficulties.

Author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha
Quote: FOCUS = Follow On Course Until Successful.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: You would not be here TODAY if YESTERDAY was your defining moment. LIVE THIS DAY and move towards your dreams.

Author: George Alexiou
Quote: Nothing that happens to you was meant to be. The only thing about you that was meant to be is you. Blaze your own trail.

Author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Best Option
Quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday, I have today and I know Him who holds tomorrow so I know tomorrow will be beautiful for me.

Author: Brandi L. Bates,  Remains To Be Seen
Quote: In order to grow, I promise you'll have to let go of some habits. 10 times out of 10, they'll be the habits you're most in love with.

Author: Orrin Woodward,  LIFE
Quote: Doubts in your mind are a much greater roadblock to success than obstacles on the journey.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: I can tie a cherry stem into a knot with my tongue. Now, if only I could do the same with my shoelaces, I wouldnt have to banana pudding my way to success.

Author: Garth Stein,  The Art of Racing in the Rain
Quote: Racing is about discipline and intelligence, not about who has the heavier foot. The one who drives smart will always win in the end.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: We cant continuously be a society of well-wishers. We must take action to bring those wishes to fruition.

Author: An Wang
Quote: Success is more a function of consistent common sense than it is of genius.

Author: Jonathan Tropper,  This is Where I Leave You
Quote: If at first you don't succeed, lower you expectations

Author: Stephen Richards
Quote: When we have reached the depths of despair, only then can we look up and see the light of hope.

Author: Derrick A. Bell
Quote: Resistance is a powerful motivator precisely because it enables us to fulfill our longing to achieve our goals while letting us boldly recognize and name the obstacles to those achievements.

Author: Suzy Kassem,  Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
Quote: Whenever you should doubt your self-worth, remember the lotus flower. Even though it plunges to life from beneath the mud, it does not allow the dirt that surrounds it to affect its growth or beauty.

Author: Nadine Gordimer,  Get a Life
Quote: Success sometimes may be defined as a disaster put on hold. Qualified. Has to be.

Author: John Wyndham,  The Day of the Triffids
Quote: We all have our youthful follies, embarassing to recall -- but people somehow find it hard to dismiss as a youthful folly anything that has happened to be a financial success.

Author: Doris Lessing
Quote: This is an inevitable and easily recognizable stage in every revolutionary movement: reformers must expect to be disowned by those who are only too happy to enjoy what has been won for them.

Author: Richard P. Denney
